channel.title: CVE Feed for 5 Star Plugins -- Pretty Simple Popup Builder
channel.description: The latest CVEs for 5 Star Plugins -- Pretty Simple Popup Builder

item.title: CVE-2024-39626|2024-08-02T14:26:15.608Z -- 5%20star%20plugins -- pretty%20simple%20popup%20builder
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in 5 Star Plugins Pretty Simple Popup Builder allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Pretty Simple Popup Builder: from n/a through 1.0.7.
